attributes.action: Let us wear our well earned medals. we were given by a gratefull nation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE the veterans of the malaysian confrontation years ago were given a medal(pjm) from the malaysian govenment.and we have not been given permission to wear them.I think that you should reverse this.. and give the right for us to do so, It is a insult to malaysian govenment and to the troops who you sent there during that time.. WE now want to wear this Medal with pride
